oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Blue Star mothers' banner
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This Blue Star Banner belonged to Henry H. Ring and Sarah Frances M. Ring, parents of three soldiersJoseph J.; Nathan S. and Frank M. It is made of red, white and blue felt with 3 stars, one for each son. Frank was killed in action in October, 1918. The Rings were long time residents of Williamson County, TN. Frank served in the 114th MG Battn., 30th Div. He was buried in France and Sarah Frances was a "Gold Star Mother" that made the trip to visit his grave in 1933.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
